title: What are the best diagnostic tools that a computer tech should have in his bag? - Quora

response.answer_text: This question is a bit subjective. Not every tech carries the same tools or equipment because techs usually specialize in different tasks. Some work on servers in data centers while other perform office or home visits. At times more experienced techs will do it all but generally this is with smaller firms. Knowing what you will be dealing with will determine this quickly. As a basic set of tools that I carried a small set of screw driver and small socket assortments and a small electric screw driver, pen light, ESD band, various thumb drives with tools, utilities and OS images loaded on them. I also had various types of ram, a few expansion cards and a hard drive with adapters to swap between interfaces.
Computer Technician Repair & Boot CD or (boot USB) , and Hirens BootDisk ( CD or USB memory). Lot of tools(100’s) for the technicians in these two products…
